subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: DeGrom allowed one hit and struck out 11 in eight innings, retiring the final 23 batters he faced, and Lucas Duda hit two long homers to help the Mets split a four-game series.
snippet: DeGrom allowed one hit and struck out 11 in eight innings, retiring the final 23 batters he faced, and Lucas Duda hit two long homers to help the Mets split a four-game series.
